## updateDiscordProfile

Update Discord bot profile (username and avatar)

### Parameters

*   `client` **Client** Discord.js client
*   `botConfig` **[Object][1]** Bot configuration from config.json

## isValidImageUrl

Validate that URL is a valid image URL

### Parameters

*   `url` **[string][2]** URL to validate

Returns **[boolean][3]** True if URL looks like a valid image URL

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object

[2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String

[3]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean
